name: Bangkok Craft: Blocky Building Games 3D 2018
description:
Do you want to unveil a place where amazing happens? Thailand is an incredible land of adventure! Don’t wait and enjoy beautiful views in fantastic blocky land, swim pixel boats - just play one of the best crafting & building games of 2017. Bangkok Craft – games for girls and boys FOR FREE!

Building games you deserve!
Building constructions and crafting in exceptional Thailand? It’s even better than you think! Build a city of your dreams and go on an adventure in Thai temples or floating market! It’s your turn to build a city of your dreams! Build & explore open sandbox world!

Crafting & building games for fun!
Best city building games let you chill up with a bunch of cool minigames! Maybe a little race on boats or having fun with a legendary quest in the temple? Explore pixel art Bangkok and feel like a real crafter! Games for girls and boys like Bangkok Craft are amazing!

Party time!
What time is it? It’s a party time! Best city building games for girls and boys let you have a great time too! Take your friends to water park, go on the rollercoaster ride or have fun on beach party at Pattaya beach! As a city builder you can build it yourself! Use blueprints or your own imagination. Bangkok Craft is the perfect place for your custom design!

Play minigames
Exploration and adventures are enjoyable but you should try playing awesome minigames! Tired of playing simple crafting & building games? Then enjoy games where reflex and intelligence matter! Try out the best games for girls and boys and take exploration craft to a new level!

An ultimate city builder
Sandbox games and city building games all in one? In Bangkok Craft crafting and mining are part of this creative pixel game! Are you a real crafter? Use blocks to become an exterior designer! Build a city or focus on custom design of your house interior! What about crafting a whole island like Pukhet? City building is tough so you’ll need to use an imagination and crafting skills. Take care of home design like a real crafting & building master!

Date boys & girls!
Find a Thai boyfriend or girlfriend! Build a city where you can date and chat in the breathtaking scenery. Are you a romantic city builder? Love story mode is waiting! Minigames on the first date? Why not! Ask little bots anything you want! Dating games combined with city building games like never before!

Features:
*Awesome crafting & building gameplay!
*Exterior & interior design craft with many blocks!
*Creative sandbox city building games you deserve!
*Floating market – become a seller!
*Mysterious Wat Phra Kaew temple of beautiful Thailand!

Let’s play a real crafting game!
You’ve just found one the best games for girls and boys. Manage inspiring interior & exterior design and use your blocky building skills to become a real city builder. Chat with friends, date boys and girls and take care of custom design! Experience open sandbox world in Bangkok Craft - one of the most exciting city building games!

**Bangkok Craft – one of the best crafting & building games of 2018.

DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE!
